transcript.title: Iraq Update Web Page
transcript.content:
An Iraq Update web page has been added to my web site at www.pm.gov.au.

The site contains:

ï· An overview statement of the Government's policy on Iraq;

ï· A 'Latest News' page, which reports on local and international developments in the crisis;

ï· An extensive 'Frequently Asked Questions' page;

ï· Fact Sheets on Iraq's Weapons of Mass Destruction;

ï· Extensive factual material on the Iraq crisis, including the texts of relevant UN resolutions, statements by major governments and Australian Ministers;

ï· A downloadable map of Iraq and its region;

ï· A links page.

Interested people can sign-up for regular e-mail updates through the Iraq page.

The Iraq Update page is designed to put the Government's position on Iraq and to provide an extensive source of information on this challenging international issue.
